definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create

sentences.english: Prior to GSR, Sonny was the co-founder of Asia Wireless Technology Corp.
sentences.chinese: 創立金沙江基金以前，伍伸俊是亞洲無線科技創始人。

sentences.english: There have been no defaults so far, says the company’s founder, Calvin Chin.
sentences.chinese: 距公司創始人陳國權稱迄今爲止還沒有拖欠記錄。

sentences.english: Ono Jinai, the first one of the founders of the Toyota production methods.
sentences.chinese: 大野耐一是豐田生產方式的創始人之一。

sentences.english: This is the typical way that a founder determines sweat equity: foregone wages.
sentences.chinese: 創始人一般都是按照放棄工資來確定勞動價值的。

sentences.english: Confucius as the founder of the Confucianism is inside and outside double in the culture method.
sentences.chinese: 作爲儒家創始人的孔子，在修養方法上是仁禮互重。

sentences.english: Crazy English founder Li Yang has converted to Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 瘋狂英語的創始人李陽皈依了佛門。

sentences.english: Artists Olinka Vistica and Drazen Grubisic are the founders of this museum.
sentences.chinese: 藝術家韋斯蒂卡和格魯比希奇是這座博物館的創始人。

sentences.english: In this sense, it was the perfect expression of its founder.
sentences.chinese: 從這個意義上說，蘋果可謂其創始人的完美體現。

sentences.english: He was one of the inventors of Cubism.
sentences.chinese: 他是立體派的創始人之一。

sentences.english: He was the founder and guiding spirit of New York's Shakespeare Festival.
sentences.chinese: 他是紐約莎士比亞戲劇節的創始人及領導者。

sentences.english: Lee is the founder of Taiwanese students to go the famous stone craftsmen.
sentences.chinese: 創始人李走生是閩南著名的石雕工藝師。

sentences.english: It may be dirty dancing, but creator, Jeff Costa insists that Cardio-Striptease is good for your health.
sentences.chinese: 這種舞蹈也許下流，但創始人簡稱它很健康。

sentences.english: The major contributions of these theory-originators are critically reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 文中對各階段創始人的主要貢獻作了介紹和評論。

sentences.english: Mar. 2, 1791, was the principal founder of the Methodist movement.
sentences.chinese: 1791年3月二日，是主要的創始人循道衛理運動。

sentences.english: Bogle is the founder and former chief executive of the Vanguard Group of Mutual Funds.
sentences.chinese: 鮑格爾是美國先鋒共同基金的創始人和前董事長。

sentences.english: The Anglo-Don may rightly be called the founders of the Budyonny Breed.
sentences.chinese: 英唐可正確地被稱爲布瓊尼品種的創始人的。

definition: head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
vice-chairman (of an organization)/vice president (of a company)/deputy governor (of a bank)
